W W 1 Enchantment - Saga Enchantment
1 (As this Saga enters and after your draw step, add a lore counter. Sacrifice after III.) I — You gain 1 life. II, III — Create a 1/1 white Human creature token. As the days passed, the storyteller’s tales began to restore hope to the village.

WU WU 2 Legendary Creature - Human Advisor Creature 1/3
2 {T}: Add {W} or {U}. You can’t spend this mana to cast a spell without flashback. Whenever you cast a spell with flashback, investigate. (Create a Clue token. It’s an artifact with “{2}, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.”)
UM02 — Altimer, Temporal Necromancer END
UB 3UB 5 Legendary Creature - Human Wizard Creature 4/3
2 Whenever a nontoken creature is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, you may cast it this turn. At the beginning of your upkeep, you may sacrifice a creature. If you do, create a Treasure token. U/BU/B: Take an extra upkeep step after this one.
UM03 — Japenta Wrat END
BR 1BR 3 Legendary Creature - Human Vampire Berserker Creature 3/3
2 You may activate savagery abilities of creatures you control twice each turn rather than once. Savagery — B/RB/R: Japenta Wrat deals 3 damage to each opponent and you gain 3 life. (Activate this ability only if a creature died this turn and only once each turn.)
UM04 — Enteir, Wilden Actor END
RG RG 2 Legendary Creature - Human Performer Creature 1/3
2 {T}: Add one mana of any color. Spend this mana only to cast Saga spells. Whenever the final chapter of a Saga you control resolves, surveil 2, then exile the top card of your library. You may play that card this turn. (To surveil 2, look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them into your graveyard and the rest on top of your library in any order.)
UM13 — The Bloodsucker's Secret END
BR 1BR 3 Enchantment - Saga Enchantment
1 (As this Saga enters and after your draw step, add a lore counter. Sacrifice after III.) I — Create a 1/1 red and white Warrior creature token with extra strike. (This deals combat damage an additional time.) II, III — The Bloodsucker’s Secret deals 2 damage to any target. IV — You may sacrifice a creature. If you do, search your library for a Vampire card, put it into your hand, then shuffle.

Acronia, Fated to Villainy END
W W 1 Legendary Creature - Human Peasant Creature 1/2
2 Whenever another white creature you control dies, if Acronia, Fated to Villainy is a peasant, she becomes a 2/2 Human Warrior and gains vigilance. R/WR/WR/W: If Acronia is a Warrior, she becomes a 3/2 Human Berserker. W/BW/BW/BW/B: If Acronia is a Berserker, she becomes a 4/2 Human Assassin and gains lifetouch 3. (Damage dealt by this also causes you to gain 3 life.) B/RB/RB/RB/RB/R: If Acronia is an Assassin, Acronia deals 5 damage to each creature and each player.

6 Enchantment
